title: Ace-High Novels

renewed-contributions.title: The Feudists
renewed-contributions.note: Listed on the cover and in FictionMags as appearing complete in this issue. CCE renewal record instead has 'The Feudist' running in installments in Ace-High Magazine from May 1932 through October 1932. (That may have been the initial plan before this magazine was spun off.

additional-note: This was a 1932 spinoff of Ace-High magazine, intended for complete stories that would not fit in that magazine.
